languages.text: "Огни в небе, что рушатся на землю и обращают все вокруг себя в лед, стонущая земля, убивающий звук, гуляющий по городам, лиловое сияние в небе... Яростный шторм покрыл полконтинента, но с орбиты различим его эпицентр — руины комплекса ксеностроений. То, что мы принимали за обломки зданий, оказалось, судя по всему, машиной... И она пробуждается, сияет синим и лиловыми огнями вплавленных в нее сфер".

"The moaning earth, the purple glow in the sky, fires crashing on the ground from above and turning all they touch to ice, a terrible noise sweeping through the cities and killing anyone who hears it... The furious storm has covered half the continent, but we can see its epicentre from orbit — the ruins of a xenostructure complex. What we thought to be the debris of buildings has turned out to be a machine... And now it rouses from its sleep, emitting blue and purple lights from the spheres fused into it."
languages.original_text: "Огни в небе, что рушатся на землю и обращают все вокруг себя в лед, стонущая земля, убивающий звук, гуляющий по городам, лиловое сияние в небе... Яростный шторм покрыл полконтинента, но с орбиты различим его эпицентр — руины комплекса ксеностроений. То, что мы принимали за обломки зданий, оказалось, судя по всему, машиной... И она пробуждается, сияет синим и лиловыми огнями вплавленных в нее сфер".

traits.locale_text: "The fires in the sky that crash on the ground and turn everything around them into ice, the moaning earth, the deadly sound that roams the cities, the purple glow in the sky... The furious storm had covered half of the continent, but we can see its epicentre from the orbit — the ruins of a xeno-buildings complex. What we thought to be the debris of the buildings turned out to be a machine... And it is now rousing from its sleep, shining the blue and purple lights from the spheres melded into it"

"The fires in the sky that crash on the ground and turn everything around them into ice, the moaning earth, the deadly sound that roams the cities, the purple glow in the sky... The furious storm had covered half of the continent, but we can see its epicentre from the orbit — the ruins of a xeno-buildings complex. What we thought to be the debris of the buildings turned out to be a machine... And it is now rousing from its sleep, shining the blue and purple lights from the spheres melded into it"

languages.text: “倾盆火雨从天而降，把周遭的一切都变成了冰块。大地呻吟着，致命的尖啸扰乱了城市，天空闪烁着紫色的光芒……猛烈的风暴已经覆盖了半个大陆，但我们可以从轨道上看到它的风暴中心——一处异形建筑群的废墟。我们原本以为是建筑碎片的东西实际上是一台机器……现在，它已经从沉眠中苏醒，镶嵌在机器上的球体闪烁着蓝紫相间的光芒。”
languages.original_text: "The fires in the sky that crash on the ground and turn everything around them into ice, the moaning earth, the deadly sound careening through the cities, the purple glow in the sky... The furious storm has covered half the continent, but we can see its epicentre from the orbit — the ruins of a xenostructure complex. What we thought to be the debris of buildings turned out to be a machine... And now it rouses from its sleep, shining the blue and purple lights from the spheres melded onto it."

traits.locale_text: “倾盆火雨从天而降，把周遭的一切都变成了冰块。大地呻吟着，致命的尖啸扰乱了城市，天空闪烁着紫色的光芒……猛烈的风暴已经覆盖了半个大陆，但我们可以从轨道上看到它的风暴中心——一处异形建筑群的废墟。我们原本以为是建筑碎片的东西实际上是一台机器……现在，它已经从沉眠中苏醒，镶嵌在机器上的球体闪烁着蓝紫相间的光芒。”

languages.text: «El gemido de la tierra, el resplandor púrpura en el cielo, los fuegos que se precipitan contra el suelo y convierten en hielo todo lo que tocan, el sonido mortal que atraviesa las ciudades, acabando con quien lo oye... La furiosa tormenta ha cubierto la mitad del continente, pero podemos ver su epicentro desde la órbita: las ruinas de un complejo de xenoestructuras. Lo que pensábamos que eran escombros de edificios resultó ser una máquina... Y ahora se despierta de su letargo, emitiendo luces azules y púrpuras desde las esferas fusionadas con ella».
languages.original_text: "The moaning earth, the purple glow in the sky, fires crashing on the ground from above and turning all they touch to ice, a terrible noise sweeping through the cities and killing anyone who hears it... The furious storm has covered half the continent, but we can see its epicentre from orbit — the ruins of a xenostructure complex. What we thought to be the debris of buildings has turned out to be a machine... And now it rouses from its sleep, emitting blue and purple lights from the spheres fused into it."

traits.locale_text: «El gemido de la tierra, el resplandor púrpura en el cielo, los fuegos que se precipitan contra el suelo y convierten en hielo todo lo que tocan, el sonido mortal que atraviesa las ciudades, acabando con quien lo oye... La furiosa tormenta ha cubierto la mitad del continente, pero podemos ver su epicentro desde la órbita: las ruinas de un complejo de xenoestructuras. Lo que pensábamos que eran escombros de edificios resultó ser una máquina... Y ahora se despierta de su letargo, emitiendo luces azules y púrpuras desde las esferas fusionadas con ella».

languages.text: 「天上の炎は大地に激突し、周囲のものすべてを氷に変え、大地はうめき声を上げ、恐ろしい音が都市を駆け抜け、空は紫色で輝いている...猛烈な嵐が大陸の半分を覆っているが、我々はその震央を軌道上から目にすることができる...それはゼノの構造物の遺跡であった。建造物の残骸だと思っていたものが、実は機械だと判明した...そして今、それは眠りから覚醒し、球体に溶け込んだ青と紫の光を放っています」
languages.original_text: "The fires in the sky that crash on the ground and turn everything around them into ice, the moaning earth, the deadly sound careening through the cities, the purple glow in the sky... The furious storm has covered half the continent, but we can see its epicentre from the orbit — the ruins of a xenostructure complex. What we thought to be the debris of buildings turned out to be a machine... And now it rouses from its sleep, shining the blue and purple lights from the spheres melded onto it."

traits.locale_text: 「天上の炎は大地に激突し、周囲のものすべてを氷に変え、大地はうめき声を上げ、恐ろしい音が都市を駆け抜け、空は紫色で輝いている...猛烈な嵐が大陸の半分を覆っているが、我々はその震央を軌道上から目にすることができる...それはゼノの構造物の遺跡であった。建造物の残骸だと思っていたものが、実は機械だと判明した...そして今、それは眠りから覚醒し、球体に溶け込んだ青と紫の光を放っています」

languages.text: « La terre gémissante, le bruit de la mort qui se répercute dans les villes, une lueur mauve qui emplit le ciel, des flammes qui tombent du ciel et frappent le sol en une gerbe glacée qui fige tout aux alentours... La terrible tempête couvre maintenant la moitié du continent, mais depuis l'orbite, on peut en voir l'épicentre : un complexe de structures xénos en ruines. Ce que nous pensions être les débris de bâtiments était en fait une machine... Cette dernière sort de son sommeil, et les sphères qui y sont soudées émettent des lueurs bleues et mauves. »
languages.original_text: "The moaning earth, the purple glow in the sky, fires crashing on the ground from above and turning all they touch to ice, a terrible noise sweeping through the cities and killing anyone who hears it... The furious storm has covered half the continent, but we can see its epicentre from orbit — the ruins of a xenostructure complex. What we thought to be the debris of buildings has turned out to be a machine... And now it rouses from its sleep, emitting blue and purple lights from the spheres fused into it."

traits.locale_text: « La terre gémissante, le bruit de la mort qui se répercute dans les villes, une lueur mauve qui emplit le ciel, des flammes qui tombent du ciel et frappent le sol en une gerbe glacée qui fige tout aux alentours... La terrible tempête couvre maintenant la moitié du continent, mais depuis l'orbite, on peut en voir l'épicentre : un complexe de structures xénos en ruines. Ce que nous pensions être les débris de bâtiments était en fait une machine... Cette dernière sort de son sommeil, et les sphères qui y sont soudées émettent des lueurs bleues et mauves. »

languages.text: "Die Feuer am Himmel, die auf den Boden stürzen und alles um sich herum zu Eis verwandeln, die stöhnende Erde, die tödlichen Geräusche, die durch die Städte rauschen, das violette Leuchten am Himmel ... Der wilde Sturm hat die Hälfte des Kontinents bedeckt, doch wir können sein Epizentrum vom Orbit aus sehen — es liegt in den Ruinen einer Xeno-Anlage. Was wir für den Schutt von Gebäuden gehalten haben, war in Wahrheit eine Maschine ... Und nun erhebt sie sich aus ihrem Schlaf, blau und violett aus den Kugeln leuchtend, die mit ihr verbunden sind."
languages.original_text: "The fires in the sky that crash on the ground and turn everything around them into ice, the moaning earth, the deadly sound careening through the cities, the purple glow in the sky... The furious storm has covered half the continent, but we can see its epicentre from the orbit — the ruins of a xenostructure complex. What we thought to be the debris of buildings turned out to be a machine... And now it rouses from its sleep, shining the blue and purple lights from the spheres melded onto it."

Was wir für den Schutt von Gebäuden gehalten haben, war in Wahrheit eine Maschine ... Und nun erhebt sie sich aus ihrem Schlaf, blau und violett aus den Kugeln leuchtend, die mit ihr verbunden sind."

languages.text: "Toprağın inlemesi, gökteki mor parıltı, yer yüzüne çarparak ne var ne yoksa buza çeviren alevler, şehirleri dört bir yandan sarsan ve duyan herkesi öldüren sesler... Öfkeli fırtına, kıtanın yarısını kapladı ancak yörüngeden merkez üssünün zeno yapılarından oluşan kompleksin harabesi olduğunu görebiliyoruz. Binaların enkazı olduğunu düşündüğümüz şeyin bir makine olduğu açığa çıktı. Şimdiyse uykusundan uyanıyor, bir bütün olduğu kürelerden mavi ve mor ışıklar yayarak parlıyor."
languages.original_text: "The moaning earth, the purple glow in the sky, fires crashing on the ground from above and turning all they touch to ice, a terrible noise sweeping through the cities and killing anyone who hears it... The furious storm has covered half the continent, but we can see its epicentre from orbit — the ruins of a xenostructure complex. What we thought to be the debris of buildings has turned out to be a machine... And now it rouses from its sleep, emitting blue and purple lights from the spheres fused into it."

Öfkeli fırtına, kıtanın yarısını kapladı ancak yörüngeden merkez üssünün zeno yapılarından oluşan kompleksin harabesi olduğunu görebiliyoruz.
